Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Matched 'Order Received' between Log A and 'OrderReceived' in Log B based on order_id and a 2-second time difference. Event names and content are similar, indicating the same event.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Matched 'Order Validated' in Log A to 'OrderValidation' in Log B. The timestamps had a 1-second difference and event types were highly consistent.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Determined 'Payment Processed' in Log A and 'PaymentCheck' in Log B are separate events due to a 5-second time gap exceeding the threshold and differing event names. Assumed these were distinct stages of payment handling rather than one event.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Matched 'Item Shipped' in Log A with 'Shipping' in Log B, as their timestamps had a 2-second difference and the event names referred to shipping.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Included 'Item Delivered' from Log A in the merged log without a counterpart in Log B, assuming it was unique to Log A.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Included 'Quality Check' from Log B in the merged log without a counterpart in Log A, assuming it was unique to Log B.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Ordered events based on a chosen primary timestamp (Log A for merged events), ensuring chronological order while retaining timestamp information from both logs.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Verified that attributes from both logs were merged correctly for combined events and non-matching events retained their original attributes.
